info.title: SwimBuddz API
info.description: Combined API schema for all SwimBuddz services.

get.description: Health check endpoint.
Get the profile of the currently authenticated member.

patch.description:
Update the currently authenticated member's profile.
Handles nested updates for profile, membership, preferences, etc.

post.description:
Directly create a member (internal use or admin).
Normal users should go through the pending registration flow.

get.description: List all members (admin use).

List all members for public dropdown (no auth required).
Returns limited info (id, first_name, last_name).

schema.title: Response List Public Members Members Public Get

get.description: Get member statistics.
Get a member by ID (admin use).

patch.description: Update a member by ID (admin only).

delete.description: Delete a member by ID (admin only).

post.description:
Create a pending registration.
This is called by the frontend during signup. It stores the registration intent
and triggers Supabase Auth signup to send the confirmation email.

delete.description: Delete a pending registration by email (admin only).

post.description:
Complete a pending registration.
Called after the user has verified their email and is authenticated.

get.description: List all members with pending approval status (admin only).

schema.title: Response List Pending Members Admin Members Pending Get

get.description: Get a member by email (admin only).

post.description: Approve a pending member registration (admin only).

Reject a pending member registration (admin only).
User can reapply later.

Approve a pending tier upgrade for an already-approved member.
Moves requested tiers into active tiers and clears the request flag.

post.summary: Admin Activate Community Membership By Auth
post.description: Apply Community entitlement for a member (admin/service use).

post.summary: Admin Activate Club Membership By Auth
post.description: Apply Club entitlement for a member (admin/service use).

patch.description: Partially update membership fields for a member (admin/service use).

get.description: List volunteer roles with optional filters.

schema.title: Response List Volunteer Roles Volunteers Roles Get

post.description: Create a new volunteer role (admin only).

get.description: Get a single volunteer role by ID.

post.description: Register interest in a volunteer role.

get.description: List members interested in a volunteer role (admin only).

schema.title: Response List Interested Members Volunteers Roles  Role Id  Interested Get

get.description: List club challenges with optional filters.

schema.title: Response List Club Challenges Challenges  Get

post.description: Create a new club challenge (admin only).

get.description: Get a single club challenge by ID.

post.description: Mark a challenge as complete for a member (admin/coach only).

get.description: List all completions for a specific challenge (admin only).

schema.title: Response List Challenge Completions Challenges  Challenge Id  Completions Get

post.description:
Submit a coach application.

If user already has a Member record, creates CoachProfile linked to it.
If user doesn't have a Member record, creates both.

get.description: Get the current user's coach profile.

patch.description: Update the current user's coach profile.

get.description: Get just the application status (lightweight check).

post.description: Complete coach onboarding (for approved coaches).

get.description: List coach applications (admin only).

schema.title: Response List Coach Applications Admin Coaches Applications Get

get.description: Get a single coach application for review (admin only).

post.description: Approve a coach application (admin only).
Reject a coach application (admin only).
Request more information from a coach applicant (admin only).

get.description: List all session templates.

schema.title: Response List Templates Sessions Templates Get

post.description: Create a new session template.

get.description: Get a specific template.

post.description: Generate sessions from a template for the specified number of weeks.

get.description:
List all upcoming sessions. Optional `types` filter is a comma-separated list
of SessionType values (e.g., "club,community").

post.description: Create a new session (Admin only).

get.description: Get session statistics.
Get details of a specific session.

post.description: Sign in to a session. Idempotent upsert.
Public sign in to a session (no auth required). Idempotent upsert.

get.description: List all attendees for a session (Admin only).

schema.title: Response List Session Attendance Attendance Sessions  Session Id  Attendance Get

get.description: Get attendance history for the current member.

schema.title: Response Get My Attendance History Attendance Me Attendance Get

get.description: Export pool list as CSV (Admin only).

delete.description: Delete attendance records for a member (Admin only).

schema.title: Response List Programs Academy Programs Get

delete.description: Delete academy enrollments and progress records for a member (Admin only).

schema.title: Response List Cohorts Academy Cohorts Get

get.description: List all cohorts with status OPEN.

schema.title: Response List Open Cohorts Academy Cohorts Open Get

get.description: List cohorts where the current user is the assigned coach.

schema.title: Response List My Coach Cohorts Academy Cohorts Coach Me Get

get.description: List all students enrolled in a cohort with their progress.

schema.title: Response List Cohort Students Academy Cohorts  Cohort Id  Students Get
Response List Program Milestones Academy Programs  Program Id  Milestones Get

get.description: List all enrollments (admin only). Filter by status optional.

schema.title: Response List Enrollments Academy Enrollments Get

get.description: Get detailed enrollment info.

patch.description: Update enrollment status and/or payment status.

post.description:
Allow a member to request enrollment in a program or specific cohort.
If 'program_id' only: Creates a PENDING_APPROVAL request.
If 'cohort_id': Validates cohort and creates PENDING_APPROVAL request.

schema.title: Response Get My Enrollments Academy My Enrollments Get
Response List Cohort Enrollments Academy Cohorts  Cohort Id  Enrollments Get

post.description:
Mark an enrollment as paid (service-to-service call from payments_service).
Updates payment_status to PAID and enrollment status to ENROLLED if pending.

schema.title: Response Get Student Progress Academy Enrollments  Enrollment Id  Progress Get

post.description: Create a payment intent (records a pending payment) and (if configured) initializes Paystack checkout.

delete.description: Delete payments for a member by auth ID (Admin only).

schema.title: Response List My Payments Payments Me Get

post.description:
Verify a Paystack transaction and apply entitlements.
Used as a fallback when webhooks are delayed; safe for production because we still
verify the transaction status with Paystack before applying entitlements.

Mark a payment as paid and apply the corresponding member entitlement.
In production, this should be triggered by a verified payment webhook.
Paystack webhook endpoint (no auth; verified by x-paystack-signature).
Backwards-compat helper.

get.description: List all discount codes (Admin only).

schema.title: Response List Discounts Payments Admin Discounts Get

post.description: Create a new discount code (Admin only).

get.description: Get a specific discount code (Admin only).
List all announcements, newest first.
Get announcement statistics.
Get details of a specific announcement.

post.description: Add a comment to an announcement.

get.description: List all comments for an announcement.

schema.title: Response List Announcement Comments Announcements  Announcement Id  Comments Get

get.description: List content posts with optional filters.

schema.title: Response List Content Posts Content  Get

post.description: Create a new content post (admin only).

parameters.name: created_by

schema.description: Admin member ID creating the post
schema.title: Created By

parameters.description: Admin member ID creating the post

get.description: Get a single content post by ID.

post.description: Add a comment to a content post.

get.description: List all comments for a content post.

schema.title: Response List Content Comments Content  Post Id  Comments Get

delete.description: Delete member comments in communications service (Admin only).

skip_community_check.title: Skip Community Check
skip_community_check.description: Skip community active check (for bundle activations where community was just activated)

AdminApproveCoach.title: AdminApproveCoach
AdminApproveCoach.description: Payload for approving a coach application.

AdminCoachApplicationDetail.title: AdminCoachApplicationDetail
AdminCoachApplicationDetail.description: Full coach application for admin review.

AdminCoachApplicationListItem.title: AdminCoachApplicationListItem
AdminCoachApplicationListItem.description: Condensed coach application for admin list view.

AdminRejectCoach.title: AdminRejectCoach
AdminRejectCoach.description: Payload for rejecting a coach application.

AdminRequestMoreInfo.title: AdminRequestMoreInfo
AdminRequestMoreInfo.description: Payload for requesting more info from coach applicant.

ChallengeCompletionCreate.title: ChallengeCompletionCreate
ChallengeCompletionCreate.description: Schema for marking a challenge as complete.

ClubChallengeCreate.title: ClubChallengeCreate
ClubChallengeCreate.description: Schema for creating a club challenge.

ClubChallengeUpdate.title: ClubChallengeUpdate
ClubChallengeUpdate.description: Schema for updating a club challenge.

CoachApplicationCreate.title: CoachApplicationCreate
CoachApplicationCreate.description: Schema for submitting a coach application.

CoachApplicationStatusResponse.title: CoachApplicationStatusResponse
CoachApplicationStatusResponse.description: Minimal status response for coaches checking their application.

one_to_one_rate_per_hour.title: One To One Rate Per Hour
One To One Rate Per Hour

MemberCreate.title: MemberCreate
MemberCreate.description: Input for creating a new member.

MemberListResponse.title: MemberListResponse
MemberListResponse.description: Lightweight member response for lists (no nested sub-records).

MemberMembershipInput.title: MemberMembershipInput
MemberMembershipInput.description: Input for creating/updating membership (admin only for most fields).

MemberProfileResponse.title: MemberProfileResponse
MemberProfileResponse.description: Personal info, swim profile, and social links.

MemberResponse.title: MemberResponse
MemberResponse.description: Full member response with nested sub-records.

PendingMemberResponse.title: PendingMemberResponse
PendingMemberResponse.description: Extended response for pending members (admin view).

PendingRegistrationCreate.title: PendingRegistrationCreate
PendingRegistrationCreate.description: Input for creating a pending registration.

VolunteerRoleCreate.title: VolunteerRoleCreate
VolunteerRoleCreate.description: Schema for creating a volunteer role.

VolunteerRoleUpdate.title: VolunteerRoleUpdate
VolunteerRoleUpdate.description: Schema for updating a volunteer role.

skip_conflicts.title: Skip Conflicts
skip_conflicts.description: Skip dates that already have sessions

ContentPostCreate.title: ContentPostCreate
ContentPostCreate.description: Schema for creating a content post.

ContentPostUpdate.title: ContentPostUpdate
ContentPostUpdate.description: Schema for updating a content post.
